description: Minor changes to PRD that don't affect implementation
original_body:
# Feature: User Authentication

## Overview
Implement user authentication using JWT tokens.

## Requirements
- User login endpoint
- Token generation
- Token validation middleware

## Technical Details
Use bcrypt for password hashing.
new_body:
# Feature: User Authentication

## Overview
Implement user authentication using JWT tokens.

## Requirements
- User login endpoint
- Token generation and refresh
- Token validation middleware

## Technical Details
Use bcrypt for password hashing with cost factor 10.

expected_assessment.recommendation: Minor clarifications added. No changes to implementation needed.
